name: Twilio Specialist on Demand
description: This application is functional customer-to-specialist demo platform. It utilizes Twilio SMS and Video.

TWILIO_NUMBER.description: A Twilio number we send the invitation SMS from

API_KEY_SID.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API. You can create it here: https://www.twilio.com/console/dev-tools/api-keys

API_KEY_SECRET.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API.
